nodes.text: The Kesmere Minor system was located in the Raioballo sector, a part of the New Territories portion of the Outer Rim Territories. It shared its name with the Kesmere and Tertiary Kesmere systems. The star system fell within the borders of the Pentastar Alignment between 4 ABY and 12 ABY and was a part of the Imperial Remnant between 18 ABY and 35 ABY.
The Kesmere Minor system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square L-4.
